kowalski.tools.data
Interface AbstractLogger

All Known Implementing Classes:
KowalskiBinaryBuilderAntTask, KowalskiBinaryBuilderCLI
public interface AbstractLogger

Base class for objects generating printouts that we may wish to redirect, intercept etc. By default, logging is redirected to System.out.
